value:
A castle where warriors from
different times and places gather...
We can be together again.$k$pNo... What am I thinking?

So many of the Heroes here are so
young and full of energy... I wonder
what they'll be like all grown up.

Don't overtax yourself. I am happy
to stand sentinel. Get some rest!

Would you like to try out my bow?
Don't worry about breaking it. It's
sturdy, so give it a try.

We had a good hunt today. I'll
make you a stew with the meat.
Hope you're hungry.

Your friend sent me to check
on you. How are you doing,
$Nu?

As a guardian of Nabata...
I must persevere!

Adapting to the chaos of battle
will require more thought.
My bowstring cries out...

Are you certain? I see! I am pleased
to know you hold me in high regard.

I am Igrene, a guardian of Nabata,
the place I call my home. Tell me,
what need led you to call me here?

Here you are! You went missing
after the last battle, so I'd been
looking for you...$k$pThinking about your mother? I see.
No surprise, given the circumstances.
I'm sorry for intruding.$k$pI wanted to ask you something...
You see, I've been focused on
defending my home...$k$pSo focused, in fact, that I realized
I've been seeing everyone else's
struggles as savage—even crude.$k$pSo...what I want to ask is this. Would
you allow me to protect you? No, I
really mean...can I stay at your side?$k$pYou see...I don't think I could stand to
lose someone I care about. Not again.
たあっ
てやっ
きゃあっ
It can't be...
Hold still.
I've got you now!
For Nabata!
Stand aside.
Reunited...
Giggle
I am Igrene, guardian of Nabata desert.
Ah! I see you like to tease people... You should stop.
My bow arm is strong. I can help you.
My duty is to repel invaders, and drive them from the desert sands of Nabata.
I can see her in every one of the little girls here...
Perhaps...in this place...I, too, can reunite with those I've lost...
I don't have faith in much, but I do have faith in you.
Agreed.
Well, well.
Let's head out.
